title: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, are the new neighborhoods of our new world: PM Narendra Modi
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi couldn’t have secured a better endorsement for his “Digital India” initiative, as chief executives of some of the top global tech firms like Apple, Google, Microsoft and Qualcomm announced significant plans for India. This was during the prime minister’s meetings with Apple chief executive Tim Cook, MicroSoft’s Satya Nadella, Google’s Sundar Pichai, Qualcomm’s Paul Jacobs, Cisco’s John Chambers, Adobe’s Shantanu Narayen and TiE’s Venk Shukla. They also joined him later for “Digital India” dinner. “I see technology as a means to empower and as a tool that bridges the distance between hope and opportunity,” Modi said at the dinner engagement to conclude what was a packed day here, having arrived in the morning from New York. ”Social »
